tests.prompt: Character with DEX 16 using Two-Weapon Fighting should add +3 modifier to off-hand damage
Character with DEX 14 using Two-Weapon Fighting should add +2 modifier to off-hand damage
Character with DEX 10 using Two-Weapon Fighting should add +0 modifier to off-hand damage
Character with DEX 8 using Two-Weapon Fighting should add -1 modifier to off-hand damage (floor division)
Character with STR 16 using Two-Weapon Fighting with STR-based attack should add +3 modifier
Character with STR 14 using Two-Weapon Fighting with STR-based attack should add +2 modifier
